Sentencas: Raw wood chips from beech and acacia were chosen as a source of solid carbon fuels for utilization in tubular solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These materials are typical wood waste products from carpentry in Poland.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The physicochemical properties of carbon particles produced in situ during the operation of tubular direct carbon oxide fuel cells were determined by different analytical methods.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It was found that solid carbon fuel had possessed high carbon content.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Based upon structural investigations (X-ray diffraction analysis, Raman spectroscopy), it was found that disordered carbon or highly defected particles had been formed from raw waste wood during the operation of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: No products of possible chemical reactions between carbon solid carbon fuel, or evaluated gases and nickel-ceria anodes, were observed during the start-up and operation of the DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Direct Electrochemical Conversion of the Chemical Energy of Raw Waste Wood to Electrical Energy in Tubular Direct Carbon Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
